name: newsapiorg-node-api
description: NewsApi-Node-Api is an open source system desinged to be a 'Convenience Interface' for developers planning to use the API system from https://newsapi.org/. This system is primarily desinged for the Free Tier pricing option with NewsApi thus may have the capacity to scale up to other pricing options as well.
author: Sricharan Krishnan | https://github.com/sricharankrishnan
